text:
@BorisJohnson bj, are you trying to wash your hands of the deaths of over 40,000 brits & rising from the coronavirus? a figure rapidly approaching the number of civilian deaths from german bomb attacks in britain during ww2 if you like making your war analogies.
you shoulda listened 2 corbyn.
